ASharp.NAME: A Sharp
ASharp.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

CMajor.NAME: C Major
CMajor.DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Gain [R] and draw !M! card.
CMajor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Gain [R] and draw !M! cards.

Jam.NAME: Jam
Jam.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Harmony.

CMinor.NAME: C Minor
CMinor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Apply 1 Sadness. NL Gain [R].

TripleTime.NAME: Triple Time
TripleTime.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, gain [R].

SteelScale.NAME: Steel Scale
SteelScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is increased by your Scale.

DrumBeat.NAME: Drum Beat
DrumBeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your Scale is 3 or more, gain [R].

ShowMustGoOn.NAME: The Show Must Go On
ShowMustGoOn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain 1 Happy.
ShowMustGoOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain 1 Happy. NL The attacking enemy gains 1 Sadness.

Feedback.NAME: Feedback
Feedback.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Sad, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Resonance.NAME: Resonance
Resonance.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to each enemy equal to its amount of Debuffs. NL Gain Block equal to your amount of Buffs.
Resonance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to each enemy equal to its amount of Debuffs + 2. NL Gain Block equal to your amount of Buffs + 2.

RoarOfTheCrowd.NAME: Roar of the Crowd
RoarOfTheCrowd.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a chord, gain 1 Happy.
RoarOfTheCrowd.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a chord, gain 1 Happy per enemy.

HarmonicScale.NAME: Harmonic Scale
HarmonicScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block per enemy, X times. NL Block is equal to your Scale.
HarmonicScale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block per enemy, X + 1 times. NL Block is equal to your Scale.

TheSilentsSaga.NAME: The Silent's Saga
TheSilentsSaga.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then discard a card. NL Add a Shiv to your hand. NL Apply 3 Poison to ALL enemies.
TheSilentsSaga.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then discard a card. NL Add a Shiv to your hand. NL Apply 3 Poison and Weak to ALL enemies.

TheWatchersWhispers.NAME: The Watcher's Whispers
TheWatchersWhispers.DESCRIPTION: Enter Calm or Wrath. Exit your stance at the start of your next turn.
TheWatchersWhispers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter Calm or Wrath. Exit your stance at the start of your next turn. NL Add a Miracle to your hand.

TheDefectsDrama.NAME: The Defect's Drama
TheDefectsDrama.DESCRIPTION: Gain two orb slots. NL Channel a random orb at the start of your turn.
TheDefectsDrama.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain two orb slots. NL Channel two random orbs at the start of your turn.

TheIroncladsInsights.NAME: The Ironclad's Insights
TheIroncladsInsights.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top card of your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage for each exhausted card.
TheIroncladsInsights.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose and exhaust a card from your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage for each exhausted card.

TheBardsLament.NAME: The Bard's Lament
TheBardsLament.DESCRIPTION: Add a Story card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
TheBardsLament.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Story card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

TheNarrativeOfNeow.NAME: The Narrative of Neow
TheNarrativeOfNeow.DESCRIPTION: If you die, return to life with !M!% of your HP.

LayeredMelody.NAME: Layered Melody
LayeredMelody.DESCRIPTION: Note B. NL Gain !B! Block and !M! Plated Armor.

LeadIn.NAME: Lead-In
LeadIn.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Your next attack deals !M! more damage.

Arpeggio.NAME: Arpeggio
Arpeggio.DESCRIPTION: Attacks have Note A. NL Skills with Block have Note B. NL Other Skills have Note C.
Arpeggio.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Attacks have Note A. NL Skills with Block have Note B. NL Other Skills have Note C.

DrumRoll.NAME: Drum Roll
DrumRoll.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Happy for every 3 Scale you have.
DrumRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Happy for every 2 Scale you have.

Bop.NAME: Bop
Bop.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage, where X is the number of cards you've played this turn.
Bop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to ALL enemies, where X is the number of cards you've played this turn.

DaCapo.NAME: DaCapo
DaCapo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Chord, copy the Notes an additional time.

Rest.NAME: Rest
Rest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL For every 2 Scale you have, gain [R] next turn. NL End your turn.

SeizeTheMoment.NAME: Seize the Moment
SeizeTheMoment.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Reduce the cost of this card by !M! this combat.

OctetForm.NAME: Octet Form
OctetForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a card, copy it 7 times, then end your turn.
OctetForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, copy it 7 times, then end your turn.

MiddleC.NAME: Middle C
MiddleC.DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Play the top Note A or Note B card from your deck.
MiddleC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Play the top Note A AND the top Note B card from your deck.

Chime.NAME: Chime
Chime.DESCRIPTION: Note B. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card.
Chime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note B. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw two cards.

PleadForMercy.NAME: Plead for Mercy
PleadForMercy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever an enemy attacks you this turn, they gain !M! Puppet.

SubliminalTones.NAME: Subliminal Tones
SubliminalTones.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Puppet to ALL enemies.

ShatteringNote.NAME: Shattering Note
ShatteringNote.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Puppet, then deal !D! damage. NL Damage is increased by the amount of Puppet the enemy has.

WallOfSound.NAME: Wall of Sound
WallOfSound.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Puppet to ALL enemies. Then gain X block, where X is the amount of Puppet among ALL enemies.

PuppetShow.NAME: Puppet Show
PuppetShow.DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Apply !M! Puppet to ALL enemies, and 6 extra Puppet to Minions.

DiscordantScreech.NAME: Discordant Screech
DiscordantScreech.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

Compose.NAME: Compose
Compose.DESCRIPTION: Note B. NL Gain !B! Block. Gain [R].

PiercingChime.NAME: Piercing Chime
PiercingChime.DESCRIPTION: Note B. NL Apply 1 Sadness to ALL enemies for every !M! Scale you have, minimum 1.

TaleCollector.NAME: Tale Collector
TaleCollector.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! +X damage, where X is the number of ? Rooms you've visited.
TaleCollector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! +X damage, where X is the number of ? Rooms you've visited.

OneManBand.NAME: One Man Band
OneManBand.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Strikes and Defends. NL Shuffle 8 random common cards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
OneManBand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Strikes and Defends. NL Shuffle 8 random cards of any rarity into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Octave.NAME: Octave
Octave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the 8th card played this turn, deal 10 times as much damage.
Octave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the 8th card played this turn, deal 10 times as much damage.

Chorus.NAME: Chorus
Chorus.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your hand with cost X or less. Copy that card at the start of each turn.
Chorus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Exhaust a card from your hand with cost X or less. Copy that card at the start of each turn.

Pluck.NAME: Pluck
Pluck.DESCRIPTION: Put a Note card from your draw or discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Pluck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! Note cards from your draw or discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Lento.NAME: Lento
Lento.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Slow until end of turn.

SootheTheSoul.NAME: Soothe the Soul
SootheTheSoul.DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Gain !M! Harmony. NL Remove 1 random debuff.
SootheTheSoul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Gain !M! Harmony. NL Remove ALL debuffs.

MaimingMelody.NAME: Maiming Melody
MaimingMelody.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scale, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

CuttingCouplet.NAME: Cutting Couplet
CuttingCouplet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. Damage is increased by your Scale.
CuttingCouplet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. Damage is increased by twice your Scale.

Improvisation.NAME: Improvisation
Improvisation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Apply 3 of a random debuff to each enemy.
Improvisation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Apply 3 of a random debuff to each enemy twice.

Verses.NAME: Verses
Verses.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust cards from your draw pile, discard pile and hand until you have no duplicates.
Verses.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust cards from your draw pile, discard pile and hand until you have no duplicates. NL Exhaust.

GrabTheLute.NAME: Grab the Lute
GrabTheLute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.
GrabTheLute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! Gold.

Silence.NAME: Silence
Silence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

Reverb.NAME: Reverb
Reverb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this isn't a copy, play it twice.

HammerOn.NAME: Hammer On
HammerOn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Note this turn, it is played twice.

NeverEndingStory.NAME: Neverending Story
NeverEndingStory.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Story to your hand.
NeverEndingStory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a Story to your hand.

Pentatonic.NAME: Pentatonic
Pentatonic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have 5 or more Scale, draw a card.
Pentatonic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have 5 or more Scale, draw !M! cards.

Tremolo.NAME: Tremolo
Tremolo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw a card. NL If this card increases your Scale, put a copy of it in your hand.

DoReMi.NAME: DoReMi
DoReMi.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Scale you have.
